LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
To configure this plugin so your customers can log in with their Twitter accounts the following steps need to be taken.

  • First you need to create an App for your Twitter account. https://apps.twitter.com/app/new
  • Next to the obligatory fields (Name, Description & Website) it's very important to enter also a callback URL. It's sufficient to enter your store URL anew.
  • Once the app was created you can copy the consumer key and the secret from the tab Keys and Access Tokens and paste them into the corresponding fields further below on this page.

LocaleResource.Name: Error.NoCallBackUrl
LocaleResource.Value: For the currently active Twitter app no callback URL was defined.
